GigaBlast

Full-field influence. Deep realignment. Strategic movement.

Some situations cannot be solved by adjusting a few surface elements. The issue isn’t just one event or one relationship — it’s the overall pattern holding things in place.

GigaBlast is a full-field working designed to influence the wider structure around your situation, not just the visible symptoms.

This is for times when you need substantial movement, not a minor correction.

When GigaBlast Is the Right Tool

GigaBlast is suited to major turning points and entrenched situations, such as:

  • Career crossroads where direction, environment, and opportunity must all shift
  • Long-term stagnation that feels woven into multiple areas of life
  • High-pressure periods involving legal, financial, or institutional forces
  • Deep relationship patterns that keep repeating despite effort
  • Life phases where “everything feels blocked” rather than one specific issue

Here, the aim is not just to influence events, but to reshape the flow around the situation.

How the Working Is Done

GigaBlast involves extended trance engagement and broader field interaction than the other tiers. Instead of focusing on a single thread or a small group of threads, the whole pattern surrounding the situation is held in awareness and influenced.

Work is carried out at power-ground sites in the East of England, where sustained focus allows deeper alignment and stronger directional influence.

The intention is to create a shift in trajectory, not just a short-term lift.

After You Book

You describe the situation and the key areas of life or circumstance that need to change

  1. The working is scheduled and carried out as a full-field operation

  2. You receive a comprehensive written report outlining:

    • How the situation presented in the field
    • The main areas addressed during the working
    • Practical guidance for aligning with the new momentum

Scope

GigaBlast is designed for:

  • Situations involving multiple intertwined factors
  • Broader life or career phases, not just isolated events
  • Clients who want deeper engagement and wider influence

This is the highest level of working offered outside of ongoing Dokology or longer-term consultation.

Investment

$1,200 USD

Discreet. Remote. Designed for major shifts, not minor adjustments.
